column4: hi, when i start my computer instead of going into the OS selection menu, my computer says: grub loading, please wait..." and then it says "error 22" what do i do?
hello? did anyone even see my question
the problem is an error in your grub configuration
try hitting  when grub starts, then the escape key.  That should get you a grub command line prompt.  If you get that far, we can help you.
